name: Power Pac
overview: The standard Pac-Man gameplay was changed in this version. A level does not fit onto one screen. Instead, the screen scrolls. You don't have an overview of where the ghosts are at all times. Now they can surprise you, coming from angles you did not have a view of. To compensate, they do not seem to chase you as actively as they do in other versions of Pac-Man. Part of the classic collection: Gamers' Delight 2.
